item.body: januari paid rs lakh previou financi year requir pay tax use net banking. avail assesse bank account net bank facil bank among regist provid facility. pay tax assesse need log nsdl-cbec websit www.cbec.nsdl.com. click e-pay menu need enter -digit assesse code select type dutytax bank name. click proceed button. assesse guid page verifi detail also modifi edit incorrect. verif assesse must click submit button direct bank website. log facil user name password. direct page detail enter nsdlcbec website. pay tax need enter amount paid account code verif confirm payment. success payment printabl challan counterfoil challan identif number cin display along payment detail bank name payment made. challan counterfoil retain proof payment tax. assesse visit nsdl-cbec websit know bank provid e-pay facil servic tax. websit also allow assesse pay follow procedur .
